alert.note: Alert for Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 12:12PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Geneva, northwestern Walton and northwestern Holmes Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1212 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Florala to near Laurel Hill. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Liberty, Paxton, Pond Creek, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Gaskin, Alpine Heights, Darlington, Glendale, New Harmony, Piney Grove, Mossy Head, Caney Creek, Gordon, Hacoda, Fox Hill, Leonia and Sand Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
